entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Showers beginning late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to snow and ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 29 March 2023
